title: Chemistry Series A investor update template
summary: Projected update format for Chemistry founders raising a Series A round. Includes structured sections, KPIs, and asks to keep investors aligned.

sections.content: Summarize the most meaningful wins since the last update.
Share the handful of metrics that show momentum and retention.
List major product milestones and what they unlock next.
Explain pipeline progress and conversion velocity.
Ask for specific customer intros or domain expertise.
Detail yield improvements and pilot plant milestones.
Summarize the milestone progress expected for Chemistry founders at Series A.
